Burbank","suffix":"","job_title":"Reporter","bio":"<p>Reporter Whitney Burbank joined the WPBF 25 News team in June 2014 and can be seen breaking local stories on WPBF 25 News at Noon, 5 p.m., and 6 p.m.<br/></p><p>Whitney arrived in West Palm Beach from WBZ-TV in Boston, Massachusetts. As a New England native, she was especially proud to cover the stories of Boston Marathon Bombing survivors, as well as the triumphant 2013 Red Sox World Series win.<br/></p><p>Whitney previously worked as an anchor and reporter in El Paso, Texas as part of the market’s top rated news team at KVIA. She covered the shifting landscape of Texas politics , soldiers stationed at Fort Bliss, and the impact of the No Child Left Behind Act in Border communities. Whitney also traveled across the border to report on new policing tactics in Juarez, Mexico. Her stories shed an important light on immigration issues, political corruption, and cartel violence in Ciudad Juarez.<br/></p><p>Whitney graduated from the Boston University School of Communications, majoring in Broadcast Journalism and minoring in Political Science. In her spare time she enjoys running, hot yoga, and music. When she's not chasing after her cockapoo, Stella, Whitney likes to hit the beach and check out concerts. She’s always looking for great new bands and up-coming shows.<br/></p><p>Whitney wants your feedback! Have a killer story idea? Send her an email at <strong><a href=\"mailto:wburbank@hearst.com\" target=\"_blank\">wburbank@hearst.com</a></strong> or a tweet <strong><a href=\"https://twitter.com/wpbf_whitney\"             function getcookie(c_name)
                {
                var c_value = document.cookie;
                var c_start = c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
                if (c_start == -1)
                    {
                    c_start = c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
                    }
                if (c_start == -1)
                    {
                    c_value = null;
                    }
                else
                    {
                    c_start = c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
                    var c_end = c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
                    if (c_end == -1)
                        {
                        c_end = c_value.length;
                        }
                    c_value = unescape(c_value.substring(c_start, c_end));
                    }
                return c_value;
                }

            }

<script>
function swipedetect(el, callback)
    {
    var touchsurface = el,
        swipedir,
        startX,
        startY,
        distX,
        distY,
        threshold = 150,
        restraint = 100,
        allowedTime = 300,
        elapsedTime,
        startTime,
        handleswipe = callback || function(swipedir){};
    touchsurface.addEventListener('touchstart', function(e)
        {
        var touchobj = e.changedTouches[0];
        swipedir = 'none';
        dist = 0;
        startX = touchobj.pageX;
        startY = touchobj.pageY;
        startTime = new Date().getTime();
        e.preventDefault();
        }, false);
    touchsurface.addEventListener('touchmove', function(e)
        {
        e.preventDefault();
        }, false);
    touchsurface.addEventListener('touchend', function(e)
        {
        var touchobj = e.changedTouches[0];
        distX = touchobj.pageX - startX;
        distY = touchobj.pageY - startY;
        elapsedTime = new Date().getTime() - startTime;
        if (elapsedTime <= allowedTime)
            {
            if (Math.abs(distX) >= threshold && Math.abs(distY) <= restraint)
                {
                swipedir = (distX < 0) ? 'left' : 'right';
                }
            else if (Math.abs(distY) >= threshold && Math.abs(distX) <= restraint)
                {
                swipedir = (distY < 0) ? 'up' : 'down';
                }
            }
        handleswipe(swipedir);
        e.preventDefault();
        }, false);
    }
var el = document.getElementById('dp_image_box');
swipedetect (el, function(swipedir)
    {
    if (swipedir == 'left')
        {
        set_dp_image('prev');
        }
    else if (swipedir == 'right')
        {
        set_dp_image('next');
        }
    });

<script>
for (var i=0; i<dp_image.length; i++)
    {
    if (dp_media[i].toUpperCase() === 'YOUTUBE')
        {
        dp_img[i] = new Image();
        dp_img[i].src = 'http://img.youtube.com/vi/' +dp_video_id[i]+ '/0.jpg';
        dp_thumb[i] = new Image();
        dp_thumb[i].src = 'http://img.youtube.com/vi/' +dp_video_id[i]+ '/default.jpg';
        }
    else
        {
        dp_img[i] = new Image();
        dp_img[i].src = dp_image[i] + '&maxw=610&maxh=460';
        dp_thumb[i] = new Image();
        dp_thumb[i].src = dp_image[i] + '&maxw=75&maxh=75';
        }
    }
function set_dp_image(type)
    {
    for (var i=0; i<dp_image.length; i++)
        {
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_' + i).style.backgroundColor = '#FFF';
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_' + i).style.borderColor = '#369';
        }
    if (dp_image.length > 0)
        {
        if (dp_image.length == 1)
            {
            document.getElementById('dp_thumb_container').style.display = 'none';
            }
        if (type == 'init')
            {
            dp_id = 0;
            }
        else if (type == 'next')
            {
            dp_id++;
            if (dp_id == dp_image.length)
                {
                dp_id = 0;
                }
            }
        else if (type == 'prev')
            {
            dp_id--;
            if (dp_id < 0)
                {
                dp_id = dp_image.length - 1;
                }
            }
        else
            {
            dp_id = type;
            }
        document.getElementById('dp_image_count').innerHTML = 'Item ' + (dp_id + 1) + ' of ' + dp_image.length;
        if (dp_media[dp_id] === 'image')
            {
            document.getElementById('dp_image_box').innerHTML = '';
            document.getElementById('dp_image_box').style.backgroundImage = "url('" +dp_img[dp_id].src+ "')";
            }
        else if (dp_media[dp_id].toUpperCase() === 'YOUTUBE')
            {
            document.getElementById('dp_image_box').innerHTML = dp_image[dp_id];
            document.getElementById('dp_image_box').style.backgroundImage = "none";
            }
        document.getElementById('dp_caption_box').innerHTML = '<div class="credit">' +dp_credit[dp_id]+ '</div><div class="caption">' +dp_caption[dp_id]+ '</div>';
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_' + dp_id).style.backgroundColor = 'rgba(255,255,255,0.75)'; //'rgba(51,102,153,0.25)';
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_' + dp_id).style.borderColor = 'rgba(255,255,255,1)';
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_box').scrollLeft = dp_id * 93;
        //document.getElementById('dp_share_box').innerHTML = '<div style="float: left; margin-right: 5px;">Share</div><a href="http://twitter.com/share?text=' +encodeURIComponent(dp_title[dp_id])+ '&url=' +window.location.protocol+window.location.host+dp_link[dp_id]+ '" target="_blank" style="display: block; float: left; width: 20px; height: 20px; background: #FFF url(\'/images/dp_share_twitter.png\') center center no-repeat;" title="Share this image/story on Twitter"></a><a href="http://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=' +window.location.protocol+window.location.host+dp_link[dp_id]+ '" target="_blank" style="display: block; float: left; width: 20px; height: 20px; background: #FFF url(\'/images/dp_share_facebook.png\') center center no-repeat;" title="Share this image/story on Facebook"></a><div class="break"></div>';
        }
    else
        {
        //document.getElementById('dp_image_box').innerHTML = '<div style="font: 600 18px \'open sans\', sans-serif; color: #FFF;">No photos to display today.</div>';
        document.getElementById('dp_image_block').style.display = 'none';
        }
    }
function set_dp_thumbs()
    {
    var thumb_strip_width = dp_image.length * 93;
    var thumb_content = '<div id="dp_thumb_strip" style="width: ' +thumb_strip_width+ 'px;">';
    for (var i=0; i<dp_image.length; i++)
        {
        thumb_content += '<div id="dp_thumb_' +i+ '" class="dp_thumb" onclick="set_dp_image(' +i+ ');" style="background: transparent url(\'' +dp_thumb[i].src+ '\') center center no-repeat;"></div>';
        }
    thumb_content += '</div>';
    document.getElementById('dp_thumb_box').innerHTML = thumb_content;
    }
set_dp_thumbs();
set_dp_image('init');
window.onkeydown = function(e)
    {
    var key = e.keyCode ? e.keyCode : e.which;
    if (key == 37)
        {
        set_dp_image('prev');
        e.preventDefault();
        return false;
        }
    else if (key == 39)
        {
        set_dp_image('next');
        e.preventDefault;
        return false;
        }
    }
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function()
    {
    var button_back = document.getElementById('dp_thumb_back');
    var button_ahead = document.getElementById('dp_thumb_ahead');
    button_back.onclick = function()
        {
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_box').scrollLeft -= 900;
        };
    button_ahead.onclick = function()
        {
        document.getElementById('dp_thumb_box').scrollLeft += 900;
        }
    }, false);
(function()
    {
    var dowarr = ['Sunday','Monday','Tuesday','Wednesday','Thursday','Friday','Saturday'];
    var dlabel = '';
    var dnow = new Date();
    var d = new Date();
    var datecode = 'See photos for <select onchange="window.location = window.location.pathname + \'?gallerydate=\' + this.options[this.selectedIndex].value;">';
    //datecode += '<option value=""></option>';
    var gdate = getqsvar('gallerydate');
    var selval = '';
    for (var i=0; i<7; i++)
        {
        d.setTime(dnow.getTime() - (i*86400000));
        dyear = d.getFullYear();
        dmonth = d.getMonth() + 1;
        dmonth_f = ('0' + dmonth).slice(-2);
        ddate = d.getDate();
        ddate_f = ('0' + ddate).slice(-2);
        if (i == 0)
            {
            dlabel = 'Today';
            selval = ((gdate == +dyear+ '-' +dmonth_f+ '-' +ddate_f+ 'Z') || (gdate == '')) ? ' selected' : '';
            }
        else if (i == 1)
            {
            dlabel = 'Yesterday';
            selval = (gdate == +dyear+ '-' +dmonth_f+ '-' +ddate_f+ 'Z') ? ' selected' : '';
            }
        else
            {
            dlabel = dowarr[d.getDay()];
            selval = (gdate == +dyear+ '-' +dmonth_f+ '-' +ddate_f+ 'Z') ? ' selected' : '';
            }
        datecode += '<option value="' +dyear+ '-' +dmonth_f+ '-' +ddate_f+ 'Z"' +selval+ '>' +dlabel+ '</option>';
        }
    datecode += '</select>';
    document.getElementById('dp_date_box').innerHTML = datecode;
    })();
function getqsvar(varname)
    {
    var qs = window.location.search.substring(1);
    var pairs = qs.split('&');
    for (var i = 0; i < pairs.length; i++)
        {
        var nvp = pairs[i].split('=');
        if (decodeURIComponent(nvp[0]) == varname)
            {
            return decodeURIComponent(nvp[1]);
            }
        }
    return '';
    }
</script>

Lake Eau Claire beach closed due to unsafe bacteria levels

Published on June 29, 2016 | Updated 10:02 a. m.
Share
Tweet
Share
Email
Comments

The Eau Claire County Parks and Forest Department announced the closure of Lake Eau Claire beach due to unsafe bacteria levels.

The City County Health Department closes all areas whenever samples indicate high levels of bacteria that are above safe standards. 

Big Falls, Lake Altoona, and Coon Fork Lake beaches are currently within acceptable standards for swimming and remain open.

The water at Lake Eau Claire beach will be retested sometime today. Public notification will go out once the water is found safe again.

Chelmsford beach reopens in time for Fourth

Tuesday
Jun 28, 2016 at 9:12 PM Jul 1, 2016 at 12:22 PM

Chelmsford's Freeman Lake has reopened, after being briefly closed due to high bacteria counts, Town Manager Paul Cohen said.

The Board of Health closed the beach at Freeman Lake earlier in the week because of the too-high bacteria presence. Originally, the town had expected to keep it closed through the Fourth of July weekend.

Cohen noted there will be lifeguards and extra police presence in accordance with expected attendance during the long weekend. The beach is open from dawn until dusk.

The beach is located off Groton Road, or Route 40. For a map, click here.

The Chelmsford Independent will post any updates as needed.

<div class="asset-content p402_premium subscriber-premium" itemprop="articleBody">
<div class="subscriber-preview"><p>Residents of the Veterans Home of California in Yountville can drink the water again.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/napavalleyregister.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-top, atf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-top-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>
<div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_top"></div><div class="subscriber-preview"><p>The state-run home for retired service members has lifted an order to boil tap water it had imposed Thursday, after routine tests came up positive for E. coli bacteria. After further testing early Saturday evening no longer showed the presence of E. coli, the Veterans Home declared its water safe to drink again without boiling, according to Cita Darnell, assistant to the home’s administrator Don Veverka.</p></div><div class="tnt-ads-container text-center hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg"><div class="tnt-ads dfp-ad" data-dfp-adunit="/8438/napavalleyregister.com/news/local" data-dfp-custom-pos="fixed-big-ad-middle, stf" data-dfp-size="[300,250]" id="fixed-big-ad-middle-mobile" style="min-height:250px; min-width:300px;"></div></div>

<div class="subscriber-only"><p>No water-related illnesses were reported, and the water system was kept operational for bathing, washing and other uses. Food service at the home continued with the use of bottled water, Darnell said.</p></div><div class="subscriber-only"><p>Although the Veterans Home and the town of Yountville draw from the same reservoir, the boil-water alert did not apply to the town because it uses a separate distribution system, public works officials said.</p></div><div class="tncms-region hidden-print" id="tncms-region-article_instory_bottom"></div>
</div>

        jQuery(document).ready(function($){
            var bThrottle = false;
            var $region = $('#tncms-region-asset_side_sticky');

            if (
                $region.is(':empty') === false &&
                $('.main-sidebar').height() + $(window).height() < $('.main-content').height() &&
                window.innerWidth >= 992
            ) {
                var $tempRegion = $('<div id="asset_side_sticky-placeholder"></div>');
                $region.before($tempRegion);
                $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );

                $(window).on('scroll mousewheel', function(){
                    if( bThrottle === false ){
                        bThrottle = true;

                        setTimeout(function(){
                            var iFixPoint = $region.offset().top - 80;
                            var iCurPoint = $(this).scrollTop();

                            if (iCurPoint < $tempRegion.offset().top - 80) {
                                $region.css('top', null);
                                $region.removeClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else if (
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#infinite-container') ||
                                __tnt.elementOnScreen('#site-footer-container')
                            ) {
                                $region.removeClass('affix')
                                $region.addClass('affix-bottom');

                            } else {
                                $region.css('top', 80);
                                $region.addClass('affix');
                                $region.removeClass('affix-bottom');
                            }
                            bThrottle = false;
                        }, 25);
                    }
                });

                $(window).on('resize', function(){
                    $region.width( $tempRegion.width() );
                });
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="infinity-summary-container hidden-print" id="infinite-container">
<div data-next-url="http://napavalleyregister.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=9139a16f-81ce-50ff-b096-e32667b61cca&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube" id="infinite-more">
<i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i>
</div>
</div>
<script>
        
            var bFoundOrigin = true;
            var sOriginID = null;
        
        var sOriginURL = scrubURL('http://napavalleyregister.com/tncms/search/mlt/?origin=9139a16f-81ce-50ff-b096-e32667b61cca&app=editorial&inline=infinity&type=article%2Ccollection%2Cvideo%2Cyoutube'); // original url scrubbed for preview
        var sFirstID = null;
        var bFirstRun = true;
        var bShowAd = true;
        var bInfiniStop = false;

        function populateInfinitySet(sURL) {
            sURL = scrubURL(sURL);

            // Until the origin paramter for cms.search.mlt functions, we have to start/stop the looping on our own
            // This will require not displaying any assets until we hit oAsset.
            // Then we loop through and display until we've been through everything up to our origin

            $.ajax(sURL).then(function(oResponse, sStatus, oXHR) {

                var sNextUrl = null;

                if (typeof oResponse.next_url == 'undefined') {
                    // URL supplied is no good. Revert to original URL
                    sNextUrl = sOriginURL;
                } else {
                    sNextUrl = scrubURL(oResponse.next_url);
                }

                // Manage response
                if (typeof oResponse.assets != 'undefined' && oResponse.assets.length > 0) {
                    
                    // Remove old more data
                    $("#infinite-more").remove();

                    
                    // Build infinity set
                    $.each(oResponse.assets, function(index) {
                            if (index == 1 && sOriginID == null) {
                                sOriginID = oResponse.assets[0].id;
                            }
                        // Display assets once origin is found
                        if (bFoundOrigin == true) {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                bInfiniStop = true;
                                sNextUrl = null;
                                $("#infinite-more").remove();
                                
                            } else if (bInfiniStop == false && this.id != '9139a16f-81ce-50ff-b096-e32667b61cca') {
                                // Display asset
                                var sHTML = '';
                                if (this.content) {
                                    sHTML += '<div class="infinite-item original row"><div class="col-md-8">' + this.content + '</div><div class="col-md-4 text-center">';
                                    if (bShowAd == true) {
                                        // Show advertisement
                                        sHTML += '<div class="infinity-ad empty"></div>'
                                        bShowAd = false;
                                    } else {
                                        bShowAd = true;
                                    }
                                    sHTML += '</div></div><hr>';
                                }
                            }
                        } else {
                            if (this.id == sOriginID) {
                                // Origin found. Begin displaying assets
                                bFoundOrigin = true;
                            } else {
                                // Origin found is false. Skip asset
                                // Fail-safe in case origin is not present in set. This can be removed when origin is fixed.
                                if (bFirstRun == true) {
                                    // Stored first id
                                    sFirstID = this.id;
                                    bFirstRun = false;
                                } else if (this.id == sFirstID) {
                                    // We've started again. Force origin
                                    sOriginID = sFirstID;
                                    bFoundOrigin = true;
                                } // end Fail-safe
                            }
                        }
                        // Append infinity set to container
                        $("#infinite-container").append(sHTML);
                    });

                    // Include block_id on newly added list items
                    $('#infinite-container .infinite-item.original').each(function() {
                        var sHref = scrubURL($(this).find(".card-headline a").attr("href"));
                        
                        // Add to image and headlines links
                        $(this).removeClass('original')
                            .find(".card-headline a, .image a")
                            .attr("href", sHref + "#tncms-source=infinity-scroll-summary-siderail-latest");
                    });

                    // Check next URL
                    if (sNextUrl) {
                        // if origin hasn't been found yet and we hit next_url. Trigger the set to pull in again.
                        if (bFoundOrigin == false) {
                            // No origin yet. Call the populate function
                            populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                        } else {
                            // Append sNextUrl to infinity set
                            $("#infinite-container").append('<div id="infinite-more" data-next-url="' + sNextUrl + '"><i class="fa fa-spinner fa-pulse"></i></div>');
                        }
                    }
                    
                        // Ad waypoint and handler to insert ads next to summary
                        $('.infinity-ad.empty').waypoint({
                            offset: '80%',
                            handler: function(direction) {
                                // Kill waypoint
                                this.destroy();
                                $(this.element).removeClass('empty');
                                // Create and append ad iframe. Make sure this occurs only once
                                var newIframe = infinityAd();
                                if($(this.element).children().length <= 0) {
                                    $(this.element).append(newIframe);
                                }
                            }
                        });
                    
                    // Refresh waypoints
                    Waypoint.refreshAll();
                } else {
                    // Empty asset set returned. Go back in for a real set
                    populateInfinitySet(sNextUrl);
                }
            });
        }

        // Infinite waypoint
        var waypoint = new Waypoint({
            element: document.getElementById('infinite-container'),
            handler: function(direction) {
                if (direction == 'down') {
                    if (bInfiniStop == true) {                        
                        // FINISHED. Kill the waypoint
                        this.destroy();
                    } else {
                        // Log waypoint hit event
                        __tnt.trackEvent({'category':'infinity-scroll','action':'request', 'label':'assets requested', 'value': true});
                        var nextURL =  $('#infinite-more').data('next-url');
                        populateInfinitySet($('#infinite-more').data('next-url'));
                    }
                }
            },
            offset: 'bottom-in-view'
        });

        // Infinity ad
        function infinityAd() {
            var newIframe = document.createElement('iframe');
            newIframe.scrolling = 'no';
            newIframe.src = 'http://napavalleyregister.com/tncms/block/1443888/?disableTNStatsTracker=1';
            return newIframe;
        }
        // Rewrite URL to for preview
        function scrubURL(sURL) {
            if (typeof sURL != 'undefined'){
                return sURL;
            }
        }
    </script>
